snippet: The British Bankers' Association has appointed Anthony Browne, previously Morgan Stanley's head of government relations for Europe, Middle East and Africa, as its new chief executive. Mr. Browne will take over from Angela Knight in September.
abstract: The British Bankers' Association has appointed Anthony Browne, previously Morgan Stanley's head of government relations for Europe, Middle East and Africa, as its new chief executive. Mr. Browne will take over from Angela Knight in September.

headline.main: British Bankers' Association Names New Chief
